an2.121:1: "Bhikkhus, these two kinds of persons are hard to satisfy. What two? One who amasses what he gains and one who squanders what he gains.[n.36]Yo ca laddhaṁ laddhaṁ vissajjeti.Mpglosses: "He gives to others"(paresaṁ deti). However, I think what is indicated byvissajjetiis not generosity but profligacy.These two kinds of persons are hard to satisfy."
